intro: After getting an engineering degree my interest shifted more into software development of complex interconnected systems. According to the last trends in automation and artificial intelligence I am currently passioned in the subject of ubiquties computing.

While investigating applications and insights of 5G technology in the industry, I am interested in its positive impact on our society and planet. This ideas bring me up to describe the projects I did as small articles you may find in the corresponding page on this site.
This website can give you an expression of my previous work as well as of some future ideas.
